summary: This is an email chain from March 2021 regarding the organization and review of document batches in the US v. Epstein Relativity database. It discusses search terms and confirms the contents of Batch 004, which contains OPR materials.

persons.name: Mane Villafana
persons.context: Mentioned in the file path for OPR materials in Batch 004, indicating they are likely a staff member or point of contact for those documents.

events.title: Email Exchange on Epstein Document Batches
events.description: Email chain discussing the contents of Batches 003 and 004 in the US v. Epstein Relativity database, confirming Batch 004 contains OPR materials and an attached search terms report.

keyFacts: Batch 004 in the Epstein Relativity database is labeled 'OPR Materials' and contains documents from a folder associated with Mane Villafana.
A search terms report (STR) was run on the OPR materials, and a report of the hits (STR_SearchTermsReport_2021_03_15.pdf) is attached to the email.
The email chain is focused on clarifying the contents of document batches for review in the ongoing case.
